# C# Fundamentals

> Core C# programming concepts including types, classes, interfaces, inheritance, and object-oriented design. Covers program structure, type system fundamentals, exception handling, and coding conventions. Foundation for understanding how C# programs are organized and executed.

## Subtopics

- [Coding Style Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/coding-style/llms.txt): Topics available: 2; Coding Style Docs documentation and reference.
- [Exceptions and Exception Handling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/exceptions/llms.txt): Topics available: 7; Exceptions and Exception Handling documentation and reference.
- [Functional Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/functional/llms.txt): Topics available: 3; Functional Docs documentation and reference.
- [Classes, structs, and records](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/object-oriented/llms.txt): Topics available: 4; Classes, structs, and records documentation and reference.
- [General Structure of a Program](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/program-structure/llms.txt): Topics available: 3; General Structure of a Program documentation and reference.
- [Tutorials Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/tutorials/llms.txt): Topics available: 8; Tutorials Docs documentation and reference.
- [Learn the fundamentals of the C# type system](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/fundamentals/types/llms.txt): Topics available: 7; Learn the fundamentals of the C# type system documentation and reference.
